channel.title: Linear Algebra on
channel.description: Recent content in Linear Algebra on

item.title: Maths and linear algebra
item.description: Course : Physical problem example : two weights bound with a spring. System of two bounded ordinary differntial equations (EDO). Solution with no linear algebra general theory. Linear algebra discovering : vectors, matrices, basis operations : sum, product, trace, determinant, inverse. Notions of free family. Diagonalisation. Two applied examples : Square inverse problem (as much equations as variables) : solution with matrix inversion. Solve a system of coupled linear EDO thanks to diagonalisation.
